alert.note: Alert for Caddo; Canadian; Kiowa; Logan; Payne (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 7:59AM CST until February 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation. Sleet accumulations one half to one inch possible. Ice accumulations of a light glaze. For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. * WHERE...Logan, Payne, Caddo, Canadian and Kiowa Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, until 6 PM CST Thursday. For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 AM CST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions call 8 4 4 4 6 5 4 9 9 7.
